definition[0]: if something is oversubscribed, too many people have said that they want to use it or have it
definition[1]: an oversubscribed SECURITIES ISSUE has people asking for more shares etc than are available. If this happens, each buyer receives fewer shares than they asked for, or there is a BALLOT to decide who will receive them
example[1]: The bonds were oversubscribed, and there will be no unsold balance remaining, the underwriter said.
